column3: Cool. This is interesting because on a wallet with lots of keys the initial startup is shockingly slow.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/bc68788317a4ece16f0cfb0cb7eb1e0e220cbc6f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK. Tested loading old wallets with the new code, and loading new wallets with the old code, all was good.\n
